Package de.bioforscher.singa.mathematics.matrices

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LabeledMatrix<LabelType>
    The LabeledMatrix provides possibilities to define labels that point to a value inside of the matrix.
    Matrix
    The Matrix interface represents a two-dimensional collection of values (like a table with rows and columns) where multiple operations are defined.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FastMatrices
    Fast(ish) Matrix operations you can use if you are sure what you are doing.
    LabeledRegularMatrix<LabelType>  
    LabeledSymmetricMatrix<LabelType>  
    Matrices  
    RegularMatrix
    The RegularMatrix class is the primary implementation of the Matrix interface.
    SquareMatrix
    The SquareMatrix implementation allows the usage of methods that require a square form of the matrix.
    SymmetricMatrix
    The SymmetricMatrix implementation only stores a the main diagonal and one copy of the symmetric values.
